verses.verse: <WG3588> For The Rest, <WG3063> Pray, <WG4336> Brethern, <WG80> For <WG4012> Us, <WG2257> That <WG2443> The <WG3588> Word <WG3056> Of The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> May Run <WG5143> And <WG2532> May Be Glorified, <WG1392> Even As <WG2531> Also <WG2532> With <WG4314> You; <WG5209>

And <WG2532> That <WG2443> We May Be Delivered <WG4506> From <WG575> <WG3588> Perverse <WG824> And <WG2532> Wicked <WG4190> Men, <WG444> <WG3756> For Not <WG1063> Of All Is <WG3956> <WG3588> Faith The Portion . <WG4102>
Faithful <WG4103> But <WG1161> Is <WG2076> The <WG3588> Lord, <WG2962> Who <WG3739> Will Establish <WG4741> You <WG5209> And <WG2532> Will Keep You <WG5442> From <WG575> <WG3588> Evil. <WG4190>

<WG3982> But We Trust <WG1161> In The <WG1722> Lord <WG2962> ' As To <WG1909> You, <WG5209> That <WG3754> The Things Which <WG3739> We Charge <WG3853> , You, <WG5213> Both <WG2532> Ye Are Doing <WG4160> And <WG2532> Will Do. <WG4160>

<WG3588> But The <WG1161> Lord <WG2962> May Direct <WG2720> Your <WG5216> <WG3588> Hearts <WG2588> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Love <WG26> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> And <WG2532> Into The <WG1519> Endurance <WG5281> Of The <WG3588> Christ. <WG5547>

<WG3853> Now We Charge <WG1161> You, <WG5213> Brethern, <WG80> In The <WG1722> Name <WG3686> <WG3588> <WG2962> Of Our Lord <WG2257> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, That <WG5547> Withdraw <WG4724> Ye <WG5209> From <WG575> Every <WG3956> Brother <WG80> Disorderly <WG814> Walking, <WG4043> And <WG2532> Not <WG3361> According To <WG2596> The <WG3588> Tradition <WG3862> Which <WG3739> He Received <WG3880> ' From <WG3844> Us. <WG2257>

<WG846> For Yourselves <WG1063> Ye Know <WG1492> How <WG4459> It Behoves You <WG1163> To Imitate <WG3401> Us, <WG2248> Because <WG3754> <WG3756> We Behaved Not Disorderly <WG812> Among <WG1722> You; <WG5213>

Nor <WG3761> For Nought <WG1432> Bread <WG740> Did We Eat <WG5315> From <WG3844> Anyone; <WG5100> ' But <WG235> In <WG1722> Labour <WG2873> And <WG2532> Toil, <WG3449> Night <WG3571> And <WG2532> Day <WG2250> Working, <WG2038> For <WG4314> <WG3588> Not <WG3361> To Be Burdensome To <WG1912> Anyone <WG5100> Of You. <WG5216>

Not <WG3756> That <WG3754> <WG3756> We Have Not <WG2192> Authority, <WG1849> ' But <WG235> That <WG2443> Ourselves <WG1438> A Pattern <WG5179> We Might Give <WG1325> To You <WG5213> For <WG1519> <WG3588> To Imitate <WG3401> Us. <WG2248>

<WG2532> For Also <WG1063> When <WG3753> <WG1510> With <WG4314> You <WG5209> This <WG5124> We Charged <WG3853> You, <WG5213> That <WG3754> If <WG1487> Anyone <WG5100> <WG3756> Does Not Wish <WG2309> To Work, <WG2038> Neither <WG3366> Let Him Eat. <WG2068>
We Hear <WG191> For <WG1063> Some <WG5100> Are Walking <WG4043> Among <WG1722> You <WG5213> Disorderly, <WG814> Not At All <WG3367> Working, <WG2038> But <WG235> Being Busy Bodies. <WG4020>

<WG3588> <WG1161> Now Such <WG5108> We Charge <WG3853> And <WG2532> Exhort <WG3870> By <WG1223> <WG3588> <WG2962> Our Lord <WG2257> Jesus <WG2424> , Christ, <WG5547> That <WG2443> With <WG3326> Quietness <WG2271> Working, <WG2038> <WG3588> Their Own <WG1438> Bread <WG740> They May Eat. <WG2068>
<WG5210> But Ye, <WG1161> Brethern, <WG80> <WG3361> Do Not Lose Heart In <WG1573> Well Doing. <WG2569>

<WG1487> But If <WG1161> Anyone <WG5100> <WG3756> Obey Not <WG5219> <WG3588> <WG3056> Our Word <WG2257> By <WG1223> The <WG3588> Epistle, <WG1992> That Man <WG5126> Mark <WG4593> And <WG2532> <WG3361> Associate Not With <WG4874> Him, <WG846> That <WG2443> He May Be Ashamed; <WG1788>
And <WG2532> Not <WG3361> As <WG5613> An Enemy <WG2190> Esteem Him, <WG2233> But <WG235> Admonish Him <WG3560> As <WG5613> A Brother. <WG80>

<WG846> But Himself <WG1161> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> <WG3588> Of Peace <WG1515> May Give <WG1325> You <WG5213> <WG3588> Peace <WG1515> <WG1223> Continually <WG3956> In <WG1722> Every <WG3956> Way. <WG5158> The <WG3588> Lord Be <WG2962> With <WG3326> All <WG3956> You. <WG5216>

The <WG3588> Salutation <WG783> <WG3588> <WG1699> By My Own Hand <WG5495> Of Paul, <WG3972> Which <WG3739> Is The <WG2076> Sign <WG4592> In <WG1722> Every <WG3956> Epistle; <WG1992> So <WG3779> I Write. <WG1125>

The <WG3588> Grace <WG5485> <WG3588> <WG2962> Of Our Lord <WG2257> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> Be With <WG3326> All <WG3956> You. <WG5216> Amen. <WG281> To The <WG4314> Thessalonians <WG2331> Second <WG1208> Written <WG1125> From <WG575> Athens. <WG116>
